biotools.summary: Identification of hub genes in a gene co-expression network from gene expression data. The differential network analysis for two contrasting conditions leads to the identification of various types of hubs like Housekeeping, Unique to stress (Disease) and Unique to control (Normal) hub genes.

bioschemas.name: dhga
